hero.title: Hi, I'm Gregory!
hero.description: MSc Computer Science student at University of Geneva, graduating Summer 2026. Background in Cybersecurity and AI through advanced coursework and research. Proficient in C#, Python and TypeScript. Fast learner with a strong interest in exploring and applying new technologies. Seeking a full-time Software Engineering role.

msc.title: Master of Science in Computer Science

thesis.label: Master's thesis
thesis.title: Detecting Misconfigurations in CVM Deployments
thesis.description: Currently developing a Python-based static analysis tool to detect security misconfigurations in Terraform configurations for Confidential Virtual Machine (CVM) cloud deployments.

bsc.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
bsc.coursework: Relevant coursework: Software Engineering, Object Oriented Programming, Databases

thesis.label: Bachelor's thesis
thesis.title: Diffusion Models in Depth: From a Theoretical and a Practical Perspective
thesis.description: Authored a mathematical framework for generative AI and implemented a functional diffusion model using PyTorch.

internship.summary: 2 week internship in the IT department
internship.bullet1: Introduction to software development and to a banking IT environment as a high school student

nexus.title: Nexus
nexus.subtitle: Personal project - in progress
nexus.description: Building a scalable SPA using a .NET 10 Web API, EF and Angular with PostgreSQL for relational data and Docker for consistent, containerised deployment. Configured a GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline.

waf.title: Web Application Firewall
waf.subtitle: Project for Advanced Security course
waf.description: Deployed a Django app via Docker behind an Nginx reverse proxy integrated with ModSecurity and OWASP Core Rule Set.
